name: Cellular Brawl
description:
-- MADE DURING THE GAME DEV LEAGUE GAMEJAM --

 https://itch.io/jam/gdl-august-jam

How does the game include the exploit (theme)?
- The "exploit" is that enemies drop a minicell after death, and since some spawners are infinite, this means you can
farm minicells for however long you want until you proceed. The more minicells you get, the faster you will gain even more minicells.

Credits:
Caphos1 - Art/Code/Idea

Note: 
Due to me developing this by myself, I had no time to implement audio.
The game has no sound.

Game Controls & Mechanics
- WASD : Move
- SPACE : Dash Attack
- X : Heal 
- K : Restart Game 

Basic Gameplay Information:

- Getting a kill by yourself gives you a minicell.
- You can exchange one hp, for one minicell.
- Killing an enemy replenishes the dash attack.

- Think before destroying a spawner. It could help you proceed through the game.
